channel.title: AMTECH-BJ - Technology Solutions & Innovations
channel.description: Latest news, updates, and insights from AMTECH-BJ on AI, automation, data science, and technology solutions for businesses in Benin and Africa

item.title: AMTECH-BJ Launches Advanced AI Automation Solutions
item.description: AMTECH-BJ announces new AI-powered automation services to help businesses scale efficiently without increasing operational costs.

item.title: Data Science Consulting Now Available for African Businesses
item.description: Transform your raw data into actionable insights with AMTECH-BJ's comprehensive data science and analytics consulting services.

item.title: Geospatial Mapping Solutions for Agriculture & Urban Planning
item.description: AMTECH-BJ brings satellite imagery, GIS, and remote sensing capabilities to support agriculture and urban development projects across Benin and Africa.
